post.title: Aid & Attendance (VA Form 21-2680): A Quick Guide
post.excerpt: When A&A is appropriate, ADL documentation tips, and physician evaluation basics.
post.content_html:
Aid & Attendance Benefits

Aid and Attendance (A&A) is an additional benefit for veterans who need help with activities of daily living (ADLs).

Who Qualifies?

Veterans who require assistance with:

  • Bathing or dressing
  • Eating or using the bathroom
  • Adjusting prosthetic devices
  • Protection from hazards due to mental conditions

Required Documentation

VA Form 21-2680 must be completed by a physician who examines the veteran and documents their need for regular aid and attendance.
